docs.text:
In [6]: Copied! 
import plotly.express as px

df = px.data.iris()
fig = px.scatter_matrix(
    df,
    dimensions=["sepal_length", "sepal_width", "petal_length", "petal_width"],
    color="species",
    symbol="species",
    title="Scatter matrix of iris data set",
    labels={col: col.replace("_", " ") for col in df.columns},
)  # remove underscore
fig.update_traces(diagonal_visible=False)
fig
import plotly.express as px df = px.data.iris() fig = px.scatter_matrix( df, dimensions=["sepal_length", "sepal_width", "petal_length", "petal_width"], color="species", symbol="species", title="Scatter matrix of iris data set", labels={col: col.replace("_", " ") for col in df.columns}, ) # remove underscore fig.update_traces(diagonal_visible=False) fig In [8]: Copied!
